item.title: Question [508] SOMEONE PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

I know this is a noob question. and i’ve done it before but its not working, how to make yourself admin on 508… i know u go to login.java and replce the name with your user… example…:

if (p.username.equals(“Whiz”) || p.username.equals(“Whiz”)) {
p.rights = 2;
}
p.stream.writeByte(returnCode);
p.stream.writeByte(p.rights);
p.stream.writeByte(0);
p.stream.writeByte(0);
p.stream.writeByte(0);
p.stream.writeByte(1);
p.stream.writeByte(0);
p.stream.writeByte(p.playerId);
p.stream.writeByte(0);
directFlushStream§;

I replace the name “Whiz” with mine and i’m logged out so i log in and it doesn’ twork, i’ve even tried compiling and restarting…

Read full topic
